title: Myriad Moves: Traders Flip Bearish on Bitcoin, Favor Ethereum Over Gold
contentSnippet: Top markets on Myriad this week include price predictions on Bitcoin, Solana’s chances of an all-time high, and Ethereum and gold racing to $5K.

title: The Daily: Ripple CEO says US won’t return to hostile Gensler era crypto climate, Paxos mistakenly mints 300 trillion PayPal USD on Ethereum, and more
contentSnippet: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

title: Trump Family Has Already Made Over $1 Billion in Profit on Crypto, Says Eric Trump
contentSnippet: President Trump's family has already secured north of $1 billion worth of profits on crypto businesses, Eric Trump estimated, amid criticism over conflicts.

title: Federal Reserve Gov. Michael Barr warns of gaps in recently passed GENIUS stablecoin law
contentSnippet: A new law regulating stablecoins is a meaningful improvement, but has some gaps that need to be filled, said Fed Governor Barr.

title: SharpLink shares fall after analyst projects 200% upside, $76.5 million equity sale to boost Ethereum holdings
contentSnippet: SharpLink’s pivot from online gaming has turned it into one of the largest public Ethereum treasuries, with more than 830,000 ETH.

title: Coinbase Launches Stablecoin Payments Platform for Businesses
contentSnippet: Coinbase unveiled a business platform offering crypto payments, stablecoin yields, and accounting integrations for small and midsize firms.

title: Crypto bank Anchorage Digital adds global US Dollar wire transfers
contentSnippet: Primarily a crypto custodian, Anchorage said it is also planning to offer interest-bearing USD accounts in the coming months.

title: Ripple Acquires Treasury Management Firm for $1 Billion Amid DAT Boom
contentSnippet: Fintech Ripple said Thursday that it bought software treasury solutions company GTreasury for $1 billion in its third major acquisition this year.

title: Stellar Slides Late as Volatility Returns Despite Institutional Milestone
contentSnippet: WisdomTree introduces Europe's first physically-backed Stellar exchange-traded product amid heightened competition in digital payments infrastructure.

title: HBAR Faces Sharp Bearish Reversal After Volatile 24-Hour Trading Window
contentSnippet: Hedera’s HBAR token saw a dramatic 5% intraday swing as institutional investors drove heavy volatility, with early gains erased by late-session corporate liquidation pressure.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Bearish October Continues as Altcoins Dealt Hammer Blow
contentSnippet: Crypto markets extended their steep losses Thursday as altcoins plunged and bitcoin tested key support, with derivatives data showing cautious sentiment amid fading liquidity.

title: SEC Commissioner Peirce makes case for financial privacy, says tokenization is a ‘huge focus now’
contentSnippet: SEC Commissioner Hester Peirce said cryptocurrency guidance is a priority for the agency at the DC Privacy Summit.

title: DePIN project Daylight raises $75 million in equity and loan in round led by Framework
contentSnippet: Framework led the $15 million equity raise with participation from A16z crypto, Lerer Hippeau, M13, and Coinbase Ventures.

title: BlackRock Expands Stablecoin Push With Fund to Manage Reserve Assets
contentSnippet: Wall Street giant BlackRock has retooled one of its money market funds to cater specifically to stablecoin issuers as a GENIUS Act-approved reserve asset.

title: The Rise and (Mostly) Fall of the PIPE Model in Bitcoin Treasury Strategies
contentSnippet: Once hailed as a fast track to bitcoin accumulation, PIPE financing now faces scrutiny as companies struggle with cratering share prices.

title: Bitcoin Tumbles Below $109K; Tightening Liquidity Key to Crypto's Struggles
contentSnippet: The bounce from the recent leverage flush has failed for the moment.

title: SharpLink Sells Shares to Buy More Ethereum as BitMine's Treasury Lead Grows
contentSnippet: Ethereum treasury firm SharpLink Gaming announced a $76.5 million share offering following a month without sizable ETH purchases.

title: Stablecoins Can Cut Cross-Border Payments Cost by 99%, KPMG Says
contentSnippet: Institutions are embracing stablecoin technology to cut costs, speed up settlement times, and unlock liquidity in a $150 trillion payments market.

title: Ripple acquires GTreasury for $1 billion: ‘Watershed moment for treasury management’
contentSnippet: This marks Ripple's third major acquisition this year after buying Hidden Road for $1.25 billion and later stablecoin platform Rail.

title: Figment acquires staking data firm Rated Labs
contentSnippet: Figment currently manages around $15 billion in staked assets across 30-odd proof-of-stake networks for about 700 clients.

title: London Police Arrest Five in $1.3 Million Crypto Fraud Investigation
contentSnippet: Police believe thousands of victims were caught in the global scam using fake investment websites.

title: Ripple Set to Enter Corporate Treasury Business With $1B Acquisition of GTreasury
contentSnippet: The deal, pending regulatory approvals, would give Ripple access to large enterprise clients as it is building out financial services around its digital asset business.

title: A16z Crypto invests $50 million in Solana’s Jito via private token sale
contentSnippet: Andreessen Horowitz's crypto wing invested $50 million in key Solana infrastructure provider Jito in a strategic private token sale.

title: Bitcoin Network Hashrate Took Breather in First Two Weeks of October: JPMorgan
contentSnippet: The total market cap of the 14 U.S.-listed bitcoin miners that the bank covers rose 41% from the end of last month to a record $79 billion.

title: Nasdaq-listed real estate firm Caliber boosts Chainlink treasury holdings with $2 million purchase
contentSnippet: Caliber’s stock has swung sharply since adopting its Chainlink-focused treasury strategy, soaring in August before falling back under $4.

title: Crypto Exchange Coinbase Introduces Its Own Stablecoin Payments Platform
contentSnippet: Coinbase Business, as the new service is called, will simplify vendor payments, eliminate chargebacks, and offer seamless API integrations.

title: Philippine Blockchain Budget Bill Risks Centralization and Privatization, Lawyers Warn
contentSnippet: Lawmakers are mulling plans to put the Philippines’ budget on-chain to curb corruption, but lawyers warn of centralization and privacy risks.

title: Crypto for Advisors: Litecoin Explained
contentSnippet: Litecoin: A resilient digital asset. Explore its history, technical features, innovation, and why it endures as a key component of the crypto ecosystem.

title: Visa Thinks Stablecoins Can Break Into the $40 Trillion Credit Market
contentSnippet: Visa says stablecoins could reshape the $40 trillion credit market, despite IMF warnings about rising financial risks.

title: Bitcoin’s Dip Below $110,000 Sparks $524M in Crypto Liquidations
contentSnippet: Bitcoin briefly slipped under $110,000 Thursday morning, with options data showing that traders are hedging for further downside.

title: NFT markets rebound after $1.2B wipeout in Friday’s crypto crash
contentSnippet: Top Ethereum NFT collections like BAYC, Pudgy Penguins and CryptoPunks remain in the red despite a partial market recovery after Friday’s crypto market crash.

title: Sorare CEO still bullish on Ethereum despite ‘upgrading’ to Solana
contentSnippet: Fantasy sports crypto platform Sorare is migrating from Ethereum to Solana, with its CEO saying it is a better fit for Sorare due to its scalability and focus on consumer applications.

title: How to use Google’s Gemini to research coins before you invest
contentSnippet: Google’s Gemini AI can help organize research, compare tokenomics and cut through noise. Here’s a workflow to analyze coins before you invest responsibly.

title: How to use ChatGPT to find hidden gems in the crypto market
contentSnippet: Discover hidden crypto gems using ChatGPT: GPTs, sentiment insights and data-driven scanners for smarter research and trading.

title: Early crypto gems: How to discover them first
contentSnippet: Spot early crypto gems in 2025 with five key checks — builders, usage, liquidity, token design and security — to avoid exit liquidity traps.

title: FIFA’s blockchain-based tickets face scrutiny from Swiss gambling regulator
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s gambling watchdog is reviewing FIFA’s “Right to Buy” NFTs, while noting no wrongdoing has been alleged.

title: Judge tosses lawsuit against Yuga Labs over failure to satisfy Howey test
contentSnippet: The plaintiffs failed to show how Bored Ape Yacht Club and other NFTs represent investment contracts under the SEC's 3-pronged Howey Test.

title: Bitcoin on TV: How shows like South Park influence crypto
contentSnippet: "South Park" is back to roasting crypto in its recent episode, but digital assets like Bitcoin have been a pop culture punchline for a long time.

title: Base NFTs overtake rivals in sales count led by AI trading game: DappRadar
contentSnippet: Base’s DX Terminal NFTs ranked first in sales counts, having 1.27 million transactions, a more than 1,000% increase over the previous month.

title: Early Hyperliquid user sells airdropped Hypurr NFT for $467K
contentSnippet: Early Hyperliquid users have been rewarded with a massive Hypurr NFT airdrop, with the free digital cats now worth over $64,000.
